str2: Of persons: incapable; of things: impossible; either the inability, or that which is impossible. Passively, impossible.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Passive - Accusative Masculine Plural
str2: From phos; to shed rays, i.e. To shine or to brighten up.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Middle - Accusative Masculine Plural
str2: (a) I taste, (b) I experience. A primary verb; to taste; by implication, to eat; figuratively, to experience.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From epi and ouranos; above the sky.
A (free) gift, a gift (without repayment). From doron; a gratuity.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Passive - Accusative Masculine Plural
str2: A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.
Set apart by (or for) God, holy, sacred. From hagos; sacred.
